body.p: Simal is a system to enable you to build your own catalogue for your own purposes. This document describes how to do this by following through a single example.

section.title: A workshop attendee list
section.p: We are going to build a catalogue that will assist in the organising and support of a workshop that will involve a subset of projects in the central Simal catalogue. This catalogue will go through a number of iterations as the workshop goes through the planning stages and on into the implementation stages. In summary it will follow the following life cycle:

ul.li: Confirmations: list of projects will be reduced as confirmation of attendance is recived
Attendee list: the final list of attending proejcts
